Download NOAA Blended Daily Winds for an sf bounding box

get_wind_data.Rd

This function queries the NOAA CoastWatch ERDDAP noaacwBlendedWindsDaily dataset for u_wind and v_wind components over the bounding box of an input sf object and a specified date range.

Usage

get_wind_data(sf_obj, start_date, end_date, zlev = 10)

Arguments

sf_obj

An sf object. The bounding box (st_bbox) is used to define the spatial extent (latitude and longitude).

start_date

Character string, start date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format.

end_date

Character string, end date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format.

zlev

Numeric, vertical level in meters. Default = 10.0.

Value

A data.frame with the requested wind data (u_wind, v_wind, time, latitude, longitude, and derived wind_speed and wind_bearing).

Details

The function constructs a direct ERDDAP CSV request URL and downloads the u_wind and v_wind variables for the given spatial and temporal extent. Results are returned as a data frame with additional columns:

wind_speed

Wind speed in m/s calculated as \(\sqrt{u^2 + v^2}\)

wind_bearing

Wind direction in degrees clockwise from north, derived from atan2(u, v).

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(sf)
pt <- st_point(c(144, -11)) |>
  st_sfc(crs = 4326) |>
  st_sf()

wind_df <- get_wind_data(
  pt,
  start_date = "1988-09-01",
  end_date   = "1988-09-03"
)
head(wind_df)
} # }
